Attacks.Name: Thunder Shock
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains 1 power. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Shocked special condition.

Attacks.Name: Magnet Bomb
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight. The target character cannot modify or reroll defense dice when defending against this attack.

Attacks.Name: Electro Cage
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, place the target character within S of its current position. Until the end of its next activation, the target cannot advance.

Superpowers.Name: Levitate
Superpowers.Effect: This character ignores the effects of terrain and other characters when moving. Enemy characters do not gain cover from this character's attacks.

Superpowers.Name: Analytic Pulse
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range 3. That character gains the Exposed special condition. The next attack this character makes this turn adds 2 dice.

Attacks.Name: Flash Cannon
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Incinerate special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Emergency Recharge
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 1 damage from this character and it gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Magneton character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
